The files necessary to run the MATLAB codes on file 8 and file 9 are describled bellow. They were used to produce the tables on files 6 and 7. If interested on running the code, just copy and paste the files in another .txt file or .csv and name it exactly as the algorithm uses (if necessary, change the path/name):

*noisyroi.txt-----------

32,8,13,12,21,16,2,22,7,26,17,23,4,5,18,11,30,15,25,27,1,20,31,19,29,3,14,9,6,10,24,28

-------------------------------
